p:
In all of ITM literatures the Mizaj (temperament) of Dorema is mentioned as hot and dry [ 50
- 57]. Avicenna and other ITM scientists believed that Dorema is a purgative (for bile, yellow bile, and phlegm), resolvent (mohallel), desiccant, deobstruent (mofatteh), laxativeand attractive agent [ 50
- 57].
